website_summaries.verdict: The CrazyFlight X 2.0 delivers the needed bounce for more energetic jumps and at the same time reduces impact upon landing. Players can move as fast as they want without worrying about slipping because of the grippy outsole. The combination of these components delivers a reliable and comfortable athletic trainer.
pros: Almost all of the volleyball players have stated that wearing the Adidas CrazyFlight X 2.0 for long periods of practice or game did not hurt their feet
The outsole is very grippy and prevented a majority of reviewers from slipping on polished floors
Droves of athletes have claimed that this model allowed them to jump higher and each step felt more energized
The ankle and heel support this pair of volleyball shoes provide impressed many users
Several wearers commend the lightweight feel of the footgear because they seem to move faster
cons: The durability of the footwear has dismayed a few individuals because the upper developed holes, the cushioning gave out, and the outsole lost traction after a few months of use
This Adidas volleyball trainer offers no heel lockdown even when the laces are tied very tight, as mentioned by a couple of people

customer_reviews.title: Runs large and wide in the toe
customer_reviews.text: Its a great looking shoe and sellers on Amazon have it at really great prices, but is really loose in the heel and too wide in the toe. We always order the same size for my daughter's varsity season. We are down a full size and crossing our fingers on the next shipment.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rupprecht

customer_reviews.title: Even better looking in real life!
customer_reviews.text: My high school student used it for volleyball. Her entire team ordered them and all were pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kinda not as good of quality as I normally get from Adidas. Bought two pairs of these for my two daughters and they both had the stripes come off and some of the stitching come undone. Broke down pretty quick after the school volleyball season. Had to buy a new pair for club volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Sizemore Family

customer_reviews.title: Great color - great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I play indoor pickleball (and outdoor) and was looking for some good indoor shoes. Loved the color and I get a ton of compliments on the shoe. It's sturdy. I like Adidas shoes the best. It does run a little big, but I wear tennis Thorlos and they feel great. I'm a 10.5 and have to order an 11. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Brings the game
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, don't slip and have excellent traction. And, they look good. I generally wear a 9, which is what I bought. Plenty of room in the toe box for impact but not sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Polly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for volleyball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. She said they support her while she's jumping and doing all of her warm up activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Her feet feel so much better!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old has all sorts of growing pains and ankle problems. She hasn't had any since she started wearing these shoes! She loves them and they fit beautifully! Women Size 7
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes but high maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Super nice pair of shoes, so far kid loves them. Gave it 3 stars because every time they can’t get dirty. Have to soak and scrub any little amount of dirt- can’t just toss in washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie grupe

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & useful
customer_reviews.text: Fit great for my daughter's badminton season. She also wears them out because they're cute & fashionable-which many court shoes are not
customer_reviews.author: DJO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe. Just too small.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe, however too small. No problems on the return process, good seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wright

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do not have much support around the ankle and slip quite a bit with lateral movements. The mesh-like fabric is a comfortable alternative to the hard leather uppers, though. They also arrived 2 days late.
customer_reviews.author: KC Summers

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I ordered a size 7 in womens they look like mens. Def are a 7 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Anita l Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order—terrible shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit well at all, had to return. I have a wide foot but these were way too wide in the heel and had very little support, very stiff shoes. Don’t buy...
customer_reviews.author: mary schule

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grip is good. Don't squeak like other shoes. Well made but a bit pricey. (Reason for only 4 starts)
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Had for a week and already ripping
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but just got them and they are already ripping
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not that good
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of these shoes. However after only four wears the part around the inside of the ankle tore. It is not worth the price. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for tennis. They’re lightweight and very supportive, increasing my confidence in making quick movements and sprints on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Zita

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty
customer_reviews.text: They were big on my feet but not too big to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, great fit, my granddaughter loves these new vollyball shoes! And they are a big improvement over the Nike's she had.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: First time using adidas for voley, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar guevara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were great just ordered the wrong size. We are re ordering
customer_reviews.author: Tony Keh

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our daughter and she loves them. Shoe laces are a bit too long but that’s an easy fix. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. She said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very picky when it comes to gym shoes. We didn’t find any Volleyball shoes in stores so took the chance on these based on reviews. They fit as expected and did eat her socks at first until she wore snigger socks. Now the team has knee-high socks, so it’s A non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pam P

product_meta.title: adidas Originals womens CP8900 Crazyflight X 2
feature_bullets: Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get
Two-tone mesh upper with integrated TPU yarn reinforcements for stability and abrasion resistance
Wide forefoot platform for lateral support and mobility; S-shaped molded heel counter for stability, support and optimal movement of Achilles
Top-grip asymmetrical rubber outsole for maximum control and lateral support on indoor surfaces
